titleStmt.title: Bridge Phase 2: Witness fMS, Collation unit C31

availability.licence: Distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License

body.ab: <lb n="c57-0157__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.11" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 18<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__2"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27356__Start"/>Alas!<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27356__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27359__Start"/>reflection in<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27359__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27362__Start"/>the<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27362__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>my present situation was <lb n="c57-0157__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27377__Start"/>impossible<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27377__End"/>one in which all <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/>volun<lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/>tary<lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__3"/> thought <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__4"/> was <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__5"/> swallowed <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__6"/> up and <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__7"/> lost. – I was hurried away by fury – Revenge alone <lb n="c57-0157__main__4"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27411__Start"/>inspired<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27411__End"/>endowed me with strength, <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27420__Start"/>& power of action<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27420__End"/>& composure – It <lb n="c57-0157__main__5"/> modelled my feelings & allowed me to be calculating <lb n="c57-0157__main__6"/> and calm <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27437__Start"/>when otherwise<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27437__End"/>at periods when otherwise delirium or death <lb n="c57-0157__main__7"/> would have been my portion. My first resolut<mdel>e</mdel>ion was <lb n="c57-0157__main__8"/> to quit Geneva for ever.– My country which when <lb n="c57-0157__main__9"/> I was happy & beloved was dear me <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>now in my adversity became hateful <lb n="c57-0157__main__10"/> I provided myself with a small sum of money <lb n="c57-0157__main__11"/><lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/> together <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/> with a few jewels <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27486__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27486__End"/>which had belonged to my mother <lb n="c57-0157__main__12"/>&<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27496__Start"/>left it.<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27496__End"/> departed<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__13"/> And now my wanderings began which are to <lb n="c57-0157__main__14"/> cease but with life – I have traversed a vast <lb n="c57-0157__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27508__Start"/>extent<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27508__End"/>portion of <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27518__Start"/>country<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27518__End"/>the earth and have endured all the hardships <lb n="c57-0157__main__16"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27531__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27531__End"/>which travellers in desarts & barbarous countries <lb n="c57-0157__main__17"/> are wont to meet – How I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>have lived I hardly know <lb n="c57-0157__main__18"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27552__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27552__End"/> many times <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27557__Start"/>did<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27557__End"/>have I <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27566__Start"/>lie<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27566__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27570__Start"/>stretch<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27570__End"/> stretched my failing limbs on the sandy plain <lb n="c57-0157__main__19"/> exhausted & far from succour, & prayed for <lb n="c57-0157__main__20"/> death – But revenge kept me alive – I dared <lb n="c57-0157__main__21"/> not die & leave my adversary in being.—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0157__main__22"/> When I quitted Geneva my first <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27587__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27587__End"/> labour <lb n="c57-0157__main__23"/> was to gain some <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>clue by which I might trace <lb n="c57-0157__main__24"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27607__Start"/>his<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27607__End"/>the steps <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>of my fiendish enemy. But my plan was unsettled and I <lb n="c57-0157__main__25"/> wandered many hours around the confines <lb n="c57-0157__main__26"/> of <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27630__Start"/>Geneva<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27630__End"/>the town uncertain what path <mdel>to</mdel>I should pursue <lb n="c57-0157__main__27"/> As night approached I found myself at the <lb n="c57-0157__main__28"/> entrance of the ceme<mdel>r</mdel>tary, where William, Eliza<lb n="c57-0157__main__29"/>beth and my father reposed – I entered it &<lb n="c57-0157__main__30"/> approached the <del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27672__Start"/>toom<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27672__End"/> tomb which marked their <lb n="c57-0157__main__31"/> graves. Every thing was silent except the <lb n="c57-0157__main__32"/> leaves of the trees which were gentl<mdel>e</mdel>y<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27694__Start"/>rustled<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27694__End"/>agitated by the <lb n="c57-0157__main__33"/> breeze — The night was nearly dark and the <lb n="c57-0157__main__34"/> scene would have been <milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.09" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.10"/>even to an unin<lb n="c57-0157__main__35"/>terested observer<milestone spanTo="#c57-0157.07" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0157.08"/>affecting and solem<mdel>m</mdel>n–the <lb n="c57-0157__main__36"/> spirits of the <mdel>d</mdel>departed seemed to flit around and <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to cast a <lb n="c57-0157__main__37"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27753__Start"/>gentle<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27753__End"/><del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27756__Start"/>hallow<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27756__End"/><lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__1"/> shadow <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__2"/> which <lb n="c57-0157__left_margin__3"/> was felt but seen notaround the head of the mourner.<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27779__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0157__main__d1e27779__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__1"/> the deep grief <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27790__Start"/>that I at first<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27790__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__1"/> which this <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__2"/> scene had <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__3"/> at first <lb n="c57-0158__left_margin__4"/> excited felt quickly gave <lb n="c57-0158__main__2"/> way to rage & despair – They were dead and I lived – Their <lb n="c57-0158__main__3"/> murderer also lived & to destroy him I must drag <lb n="c57-0158__main__4"/> out my <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27815__Start"/>we<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27815__End"/> weary existence. I knelt on the earth <lb n="c57-0158__main__5"/> and with <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27820__Start"/>a<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27820__End"/> quirvering lips exclaimed – By the <lb n="c57-0158__main__6"/> Sacred earth <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>on which I kneel <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27839__Start"/>on<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27839__End"/>, by the shades <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that<mdel>I</mdel> wander <lb n="c57-0158__main__7"/> near me. By the deep & eternal grief that <lb n="c57-0158__main__8"/> I feel I swear — And by thee oh night and by <lb n="c57-0158__main__9"/> the spirits that preside over thee I swear <lb n="c57-0158__main__10"/> to pursue the dæmon who caused this misery <lb n="c57-0158__main__11"/> untill he or I shall <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27868__Start"/>fall<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27868__End"/>perish in a mortal <lb n="c57-0158__main__12"/> conflict – For this purpose I will preserve <lb n="c57-0158__main__13"/> my life — To execute this <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>dear revenge will I again <lb n="c57-0158__main__14"/><mdel>s</mdel>behold the sun &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>tread the green herbage of earth <lb n="c57-0158__main__15"/> which otherwise should vanish from my <lb n="c57-0158__main__16"/> eyes for ever – And I call on you spirits of <lb n="c57-0158__main__17"/> the dead & you wandering ministers of ven<lb n="c57-0158__main__18"/>geance to aid me & conduct me in my <lb n="c57-0158__main__19"/> work. Let the cursed & hellish monster <lb n="c57-0158__main__20"/> drink deep of agony – <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27927__Start"/>And his heart<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27927__End"/> Let <lb n="c57-0158__main__21"/> him feel the despair that now torments <lb n="c57-0158__main__22"/> me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__23"/> I had begun my adjuration with <lb n="c57-0158__main__24"/> solemnity & an awe that almost assured <lb n="c57-0158__main__25"/> me that the shades of my murdered friends <lb n="c57-0158__main__26"/> heard & approved my <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27948__Start"/>oath<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27948__End"/>devotion – But the <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27957__Start"/>furies<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27957__End"/><lb n="c57-0158__main__27"/> possessed me as I concluded it &<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27964__Start"/>I was<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27964__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rage choaked <lb n="c57-0158__main__28"/> my utterance. I was answered through the <lb n="c57-0158__main__29"/> stillness of night by a loud & fiendish laugh– <lb n="c57-0158__main__30"/> It rung my ears long and heavily; the <lb n="c57-0158__main__31"/> mountains re-echoed it and I felt as if <lb n="c57-0158__main__32"/> all Hell surrounded me with mockery <lb n="c57-0158__main__33"/> and laughing—Surely in that moment I <lb n="c57-0158__main__34"/> should have been possessed by frenzy <lb n="c57-0158__main__35"/> and have destroyed <del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27993__Start"/>t<del loc="c57-0158__main__d1e27993__End"/> my miserable exis<lb n="c57-0159__main__1"/>tence, <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28009__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28009__End"/>but that my vow was heard and I <lb n="c57-0159__main__2"/> was reserved for vengeance – The laughter <lb n="c57-0159__main__3"/> died away <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28023__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28023__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>when a well known and <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28034__Start"/>detested<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28034__End"/><lb n="c57-0159__main__4"/> abhorred voice apparently close to my ear ad<lb n="c57-0159__main__5"/>dressed me in an audible whisper – I am sa<lb n="c57-0159__main__6"/>tisfied, <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28052__Start"/>it said,<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28052__End"/> miserable wretch, you have <lb n="c57-0159__main__7"/> determined to live & I am satisfied – I darted <lb n="c57-0159__main__8"/> towards the place from which the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28060__Start"/>moon<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28060__End"/> sound <lb n="c57-0159__main__9"/> proceeded but the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28067__Start"/>wretch<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28067__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28074__Start"/>villain<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28074__End"/>devil eluded my grasp. <lb n="c57-0159__main__10"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28083__Start"/>When<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28083__End"/> suddenly the broard disk of the moon <lb n="c57-0159__main__11"/> arose and shone fully upon the dæmon <lb n="c57-0159__main__12"/> who fled.his ghastly & distorted shape, as he fled with<lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/> more than <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/> mortal speed.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0159__main__13"/> I persued <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>him;– & for many months this <lb n="c57-0159__main__14"/><lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/>pursuit has been my task. <mdel>g</mdel>Guided by a slight clue <lb n="c57-0159__main__15"/> I <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28142__Start"/>w<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28142__End"/> followed the windings of the Rhone <lb n="c57-0159__main__16"/> but vainly – The mediterranean appeared <lb n="c57-0159__main__17"/> and by a strange chance I saw the fiend <lb n="c57-0159__main__18"/> enter by night & hide himself in a vessel <lb n="c57-0159__main__19"/> bound for the black sea – I followed him <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/> I knew the <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/> vessel in which <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__3"/> he was concealed <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__4"/>& he escaped me <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__5"/> I know not <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__6"/> how.<lb n="c57-0159__main__20"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28174__Start"/>Along the<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28174__End"/> Amidst the wilds of Tartary&<lb n="c57-0159__main__21"/> Russia although he still <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28181__Start"/>escaped<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28181__End"/>evaded me <lb n="c57-0159__main__22"/> I have ever followed in his track – Some<lb n="c57-0159__main__23"/>times the peasants scared by his horrid <lb n="c57-0159__main__24"/> Apparition informed me of his path <lb n="c57-0159__main__25"/> Sometimes he himself who feared that <lb n="c57-0159__main__26"/> if I lost all trace I should despair & die <lb n="c57-0159__main__27"/> often left some mark to guide me –The <lb n="c57-0159__main__28"/> snows descended on my head & I saw the <del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28210__Start"/>mark<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28210__End"/>print<lb n="c57-0159__main__29"/> of his huge step on the white plain –To <lb n="c57-0159__main__30"/> you are fast enterring on life, & care is new to you &<metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0159.08">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> agony unknown how can <lb n="c57-0159__main__31"/><del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28245__Start"/>I describe<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28245__End"/>you understand what I have felt & still feel. <lb n="c57-0159__main__32"/> Cold, want &<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28256__Start"/>thirst<del loc="c57-0159__main__d1e28256__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>fatigue were <mdel>my</mdel>the least pains <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__1"/> which I was <lb n="c57-0159__left_margin__2"/> destined to endure;<lb n="c57-0159__main__33"/> I was cursed by some devil & bore about <lb n="c57-0159__main__34"/> with me my eternal Hell – Yet still a <lb n="c57-0159__main__35"/> spirit of good followed & directed my steps<lb n="c57-0160__main__1"/> and when I most murmured would suddenly <lb n="c57-0160__main__2"/> extricate me from my seemingly insur<lb n="c57-0160__main__3"/>mountable difficulties— Sometimes when <lb n="c57-0160__main__4"/> nature overcome by hunger sunk under <lb n="c57-0160__main__5"/> the exhaustion a repast was prepared for <lb n="c57-0160__main__6"/> me in the desart that restored & inspirited <lb n="c57-0160__main__7"/> me– The fare indeed was coarse such as the <lb n="c57-0160__main__8"/> peasants of the country <del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28326__Start"/>lived on<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28326__End"/>ate but I <lb n="c57-0160__main__9"/> may not doubt that it was set there <lb n="c57-0160__main__10"/> by the spirits I had invoked to aid me. Often <lb n="c57-0160__main__11"/>when all was dry <del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28341__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28341__End"/> the heavens cloudless <lb n="c57-0160__main__12"/>& I was parched with thirst – a slight <lb n="c57-0160__main__13"/> cloud would bedim the sky – shed the few <lb n="c57-0160__main__14"/> drops that revived me, & vanish.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0160__main__15"/> I followed when I could the courses <lb n="c57-0160__main__16"/> of rivers but the dæmon generally avoided <lb n="c57-0160__main__17"/> these as it was here that the population <lb n="c57-0160__main__18"/> of the country chiefly collected– In other <lb n="c57-0160__main__19"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28363__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28363__End"/>places human beings were seldom <lb n="c57-0160__main__20"/> seen & I generally subsisted <mdel>by</mdel><metamark>^</metamark>on the wild <lb n="c57-0160__main__21"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28385__Start"/>game<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28385__End"/>animals that crossed my path – I had money <lb n="c57-0160__main__22"/> with me & gained the friendship of the <lb n="c57-0160__main__23"/> villagers by distributing it or bringing with <lb n="c57-0160__main__24"/> me some <mdel>a</mdel><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28411__Start"/>beast<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28411__End"/><metamark>^</metamark>food that I had killed <lb n="c57-0160__main__25"/> which after taking a small part I al<lb n="c57-0160__main__26"/>ways presented to those who had provided <lb n="c57-0160__main__27"/> with fire & utensils.<metamark>^</metamark>for cooking My life as it passed <lb n="c57-0160__main__28"/> thus was indeed hateful to me & it was <lb n="c57-0160__main__29"/> during sleep alone that I could taste <lb n="c57-0160__main__30"/> joy – Oh blessed sleep! often when most <lb n="c57-0160__main__31"/> miserable I sunk to repose & my dreams <lb n="c57-0160__main__32"/><del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28453__Start"/>lu<del loc="c57-0160__main__d1e28453__End"/> lulled <metamark>^</metamark>me even to rapture – The spirit <lb n="c57-0160__main__33"/> that guarded me had surely provided <lb n="c57-0160__main__34"/> these moments or rather hours of happi<lb n="c57-0160__main__35"/>ness that I might retain strength to<lb n="c57-0161__main__1"/> fulfil my pilgrimage <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28486__Start"/>without them I should<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28486__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/> Deprived of this <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/> respite I should <lb n="c57-0161__main__2"/> have sunk under my hardships <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28502__Start"/>& misery<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28502__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__3"/><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28506__Start"/>but<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28506__End"/> during the day I was <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thus sustained &inspri<lb n="c57-0161__main__4"/>ted by the hope of night; <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28528__Start"/>& sleep – I then<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28528__End"/>for in sleep I saw <lb n="c57-0161__main__5"/> my friends my wife & my beloved country <lb n="c57-0161__main__6"/> again I saw the benevolent countenance <lb n="c57-0161__main__7"/> of my <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28542__Start"/>b<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28542__End"/> father,– heard the silver <mdel>s</mdel>tones of <lb n="c57-0161__main__8"/> my Elizabeths voice and beheld Clerval <lb n="c57-0161__main__9"/> enjoying health & youth – Often when <lb n="c57-0161__main__10"/> wearied by a toilsome march I persua<lb n="c57-0161__main__11"/>ded myself that I was <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28568__Start"/>then<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28568__End"/> dreaming <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>until night should come&<lb n="c57-0161__main__12"/> that <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28584__Start"/>reality<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28584__End"/> I <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>should then enjoy<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28597__Start"/>ed<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28597__End"/> reality <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28600__Start"/>when I was again<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28600__End"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__13"/> in the arms of my dearest friends–What <lb n="c57-0161__main__14"/> agonizing fondness did I feel for them–how <lb n="c57-0161__main__15"/> did I cling to their dear forms as sometimes they <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28619__Start"/>pursed<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28619__End"/>hauntedeven<lb n="c57-0161__main__16"/><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/> the visions of <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/> my waking <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__3"/> hours<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28643__Start"/>my <mdel>m</mdel>day<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28643__End"/><del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28655__Start"/>as well as night dreams<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28655__End"/> and per<lb n="c57-0161__main__17"/>suade myself that they still lived. At such <lb n="c57-0161__main__18"/> moments the vengeance that burned <lb n="c57-0161__main__19"/> within<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28670__Start"/>g<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28670__End"/> me died in my heart and I pursued <lb n="c57-0161__main__20"/> my path towards the destruction of the dæ<lb n="c57-0161__main__21"/>mon more as a task enjoined by heaven, <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0161.05">X</metamark><lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> as the mechanical <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/> impulse of <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__3"/> some power of which <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__4"/> I was uncon<lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__5"/>scious,<lb n="c57-0161__main__22"/> than the ardent desire of my soul.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0161__main__23"/> What his feelings were whom I pur<lb n="c57-0161__main__24"/>sued I <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28722__Start"/>hardly<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28722__End"/>cannot know – <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28729__Start"/>Yet<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28729__End"/><mdel>s</mdel>Sometimes indeed he <lb n="c57-0161__main__25"/> left marks in writing on the barks of <lb n="c57-0161__main__26"/> trees or cut on stone that guided me, <lb n="c57-0161__main__27"/>& instigated my fury — My reign is not yet <lb n="c57-0161__main__28"/> over, <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28752__Start"/>he said<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28752__End"/>was legible<mdel>on</mdel>in one of these <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>inscriptions–– You live &<lb n="c57-0161__main__29"/> my power is complete. Follow me –I seek <lb n="c57-0161__main__30"/> the everlasting ices of the north where you <lb n="c57-0161__main__31"/> will feel the misery of <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28785__Start"/>go<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28785__End"/> cold & frostbut <lb n="c57-0161__main__32"/> I shall not for cold is sweeter to me <lb n="c57-0161__main__33"/> than heat–<lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__1"/> to which I am <lb n="c57-0161__left_margin__2"/> impassive You will find near this place <lb n="c57-0161__main__34"/> if you follow not too tardily, a dead <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28812__Start"/>hair<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28812__End"/>hare<lb n="c57-0161__main__35"/> eat & be revived. <del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28821__Start"/>for I<del loc="c57-0161__main__d1e28821__End"/> Come on my enemy<lb n="c57-0162__main__1"/> we have yet to wrestle for our lives but many <lb n="c57-0162__main__2"/> hard & miserable hours will you spend <lb n="c57-0162__main__3"/> untill that period arrives"—<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0162__main__4"/> Scoffing Devils! Again do I vow vengeance <lb n="c57-0162__main__5"/> again do I devote thee miserable fiend to <lb n="c57-0162__main__6"/> torture & death never will I <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28849__Start"/>leave<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28849__End"/>omit my search <lb n="c57-0162__main__7"/> untill he <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28860__Start"/>dies<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28860__End"/>or I, perish. – And then with what <lb n="c57-0162__main__8"/> extacy shall I <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28870__Start"/>fe<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28870__End"/> join my Elizabeth &<lb n="c57-0162__main__9"/> those who even <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>now prepare for me <mdel>a</mdel>the<lb n="c57-0162__main__10"/> reward <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28899__Start"/>for<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28899__End"/>of my tedious &<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28906__Start"/><del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28906__End"/> horrible <lb n="c57-0162__main__11"/> pilgrimage<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0162__main__12"/> As I pursed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>still my journey <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28926__Start"/>still<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28926__End"/> to the <lb n="c57-0162__main__13"/> northward<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28931__Start"/>s<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28931__End"/> the snows <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thickened,& cold encreased to an <lb n="c57-0162__main__14"/> almos<mdel>to</mdel>in ae degree almost too severe to support. <lb n="c57-0162__main__15"/> The peasantry were shut up in their hovels <lb n="c57-0162__main__16"/> and only a few of the most hardy ventured <lb n="c57-0162__main__17"/> forth to seize the animals whom starvation <lb n="c57-0162__main__18"/> had forced forth to seek for prey. The rivers <lb n="c57-0162__main__19"/> were covered with ice and no fish could <lb n="c57-0162__main__20"/> be procured. The triumph of my enemy <lb n="c57-0162__main__21"/> encreased with the difficulty of my labours <lb n="c57-0162__main__22"/> One <del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28977__Start"/>en<del loc="c57-0162__main__d1e28977__End"/> inscription that he left was in <lb n="c57-0162__main__23"/> these words – Prepare – your toils only begin – <lb n="c57-0162__main__24"/>Wrap yourself in furs & provide food for <lb n="c57-0162__main__25"/> we shall soon enter on a journey where <lb n="c57-0162__main__26"/> you sufferings will satisfy my everlasting hat<mdel>e</mdel>red" My cou<lb n="c57-0162__main__27"/>rage& perseverance were inspired with <lb n="c57-0162__main__28"/> new strength by these difficulties I resolved <lb n="c57-0162__main__29"/> not to fail in my pur<mdel/>pose and calling <lb n="c57-0162__main__30"/> heaven to support me I continued with <lb n="c57-0162__main__31"/> unabated fervour to traverse immense <lb n="c57-0162__main__32"/> desarts untill the occean appeared at a <lb n="c57-0162__main__33"/> distance and formed the utmost boundary <lb n="c57-0162__main__34"/> of the horizon –Oh How unlike it was to the <lb n="c57-0162__main__35"/> blue se<mdel>e</mdel>as of the south Covered with ice it <lb n="c57-0162__main__36"/> was only to be distinguished from land by<lb n="c57-0163__main__1"/> its superior wildness & ruggedness—The greeks wept <lb n="c57-0163__main__2"/> when they saw the mediterranean from the hills <lb n="c57-0163__main__3"/> of Asia and hailed with rapture the boundary of <lb n="c57-0163__main__4"/> their toils – I did not weep but I knelt down & thanked <lb n="c57-0163__main__5"/> my <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29067__Start"/>guardian<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29067__End"/> guiding spirit with a full heart <lb n="c57-0163__main__6"/> for conducting me safety towards the place where <lb n="c57-0163__main__7"/> I hoped notwithstanding my adversarys threat to <lb n="c57-0163__main__8"/> meet & grapple with him — <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29076__Start"/>For<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29076__End"/> some weeks before <lb n="c57-0163__main__9"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/> this <lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__2"/> period I had procured a sledge & dogs and thus traversed <lb n="c57-0163__main__10"/> the snows with inconceivable speed I know not <lb n="c57-0163__main__11"/> whether the fiend possessed the same advantages <lb n="c57-0163__main__12"/> but I found that as before I had <metamark function="insert" place="sublinear">^</metamark>daily lost <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29107__Start"/>in<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29107__End"/> the <lb n="c57-0163__main__13"/> advantage in my persuit I now gained on him <lb n="c57-0163__main__14"/> so much that when I for the first time <lb n="c57-0163__main__15"/> saw the occean– he was but one days journey <lb n="c57-0163__main__16"/> in advance & I hoped soon to intercept him <lb n="c57-0163__main__17"/> With new courage therefore I pressed on & in <lb n="c57-0163__main__18"/> two days arrived at a wretched hamlet on <lb n="c57-0163__main__19"/> the sea shore. I enquired concerning the fiend <lb n="c57-0163__main__20"/>& gained every information –A gigantic <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29127__Start"/>devil<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29127__End"/><lb n="c57-0163__main__21"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>monster they said had arrived the night before –Armed <lb n="c57-0163__main__22"/> with a gun and many pistols & putting <metamark function="insert" place="sublinear">^</metamark>to flight the inha<lb n="c57-0163__main__23"/>bitants of a solitary cottage <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29158__Start"/>to flight<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29158__End"/> through <lb n="c57-0163__main__24"/> fear of his <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29163__Start"/>horr<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29163__End"/> terrific appearance, he had <lb n="c57-0163__main__25"/><del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29172__Start"/>seized on<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29172__End"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>carried off their store of <del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29216__Start"/>d<del loc="c57-0163__main__d1e29216__End"/> joy of the horror struck villagers <lb n="c57-0163__main__30"/><lb n="c57-0163__left_margin__1"/>had pursued his n="c57-0163__main__32"/> conjectured that he must be speedily destroyed <lb n="c57-0163__main__33"/> in the breaking of the ice or frozen by the <lb n="c57-0163__main__34"/> eternal frost.–<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0163__main__35"/> On hearing this information I suffered a tem<lb n="c57-0164__main__1"/>porary fit of despair – he had escaped me and I <lb n="c57-0164__main__2"/> must now commence a destructive & almost <lb n="c57-0164__main__3"/> endless journey across the mountainous ices <lb n="c57-0164__main__4"/> of the occean – amidst cold that few of the <lb n="c57-0164__main__5"/> inhabitants could long endure &<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29264__Start"/>how could<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29264__End"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__6"/><lb Yet at the idea that the <lb n="c57-0164__main__8"/> fiend should <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29309__Start"/>lif<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29309__End"/> live & be triumphant my <lb n="c57-0164__main__9"/> rage and vengeance returned & like a <lb n="c57-0164__main__10"/> mighty tide overwhelmed every other fee<lb n="c57-0164__main__11"/>ling. After <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29323__Start"/>tasting<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29323__End"/> a slight repose during <lb n="c57-0164__main__12"/> which the spirits of the dead hovered round <lb n="c57-0164__main__13"/> me & instigated me to toil & revenge I <lb n="c57-0164__main__14"/> prepared for my journey.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__15"/> I exchanged my land sledge for <lb n="c57-0164__main__16"/> one fashioned for the ruggedness of the <lb n="c57-0164__main__17"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>frozen ocean and purchasing a plentiful stock <lb n="c57-0164__main__18"/> of provisions I departed from land. How <lb n="c57-0164__main__19"/> many days have passed since then I know <lb n="c57-0164__main__20"/> not but I have endured misery <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29356__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29356__End"/>which<lb n="c57-0164__main__21"/> nothing but the eternal sentiment <del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29366__Start"/>that<del loc="c57-0164__main__d1e29366__End"/><lb n="c57-0164__main__22"/><lb n="c57-0164__left_margin__1"/>of a just revenge burn<mdel>s</mdel>ing within my heart could have enabled <lb n="c57-0164__main__23"/> me to support. Oh <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29603__Start"/>hope<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29603__End"/> with what <lb n="c57-0165__main__10"/> a burning gush did hope revisit my heart – warm <lb n="c57-0165__main__11"/> tears filled my eyes which I hastily wiped away <lb n="c57-0165__main__12"/> that they might not <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29619__Start"/>be present in them to<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29619__End"/> intercept the view I had of the <lb n="c57-0165__main__13"/> fiend. I followed— but still the dew dimmed my <lb n="c57-0165__main__14"/> sight untill giving way to the emotions that <lb n="c57-0165__main__15"/> oppressed me I wept aloud.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0165__main__16"/> But this was not the time for delay <lb n="c57-0165__main__17"/> I disincumbered the<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29642__Start"/>ir<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29642__End"/> dogs of their dead compa<lb n="c57-0165__main__18"/>nion<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29652__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29652__End"/> gave them a plentiful portion of <lb n="c57-0165__main__19"/> food and after an hours repose which was abso<lb n="c57-0165__main__20"/>lutely necessary & yet which was bitterly irksome <lb n="c57-0165__main__21"/> to me I continued my path — The sledge was <lb n="c57-0165__main__22"/> still visible nor did I again lose sight of it <lb n="c57-0165__main__23"/> except at the moments when for a short time <lb n="c57-0165__main__24"/> some ice rock <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29674__Start"/>hid<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29674__End"/>concealed it <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29689__Start"/>from<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29689__End"/> with its intervening crags. I indeed perceptibly <lb n="c57-0165__main__25"/> gained on <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29698__Start"/>it.<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29698__End"/>the object of my pursuit. – But <lb n="c57-0165__main__29"/> now when I appeared almost within grasp <lb n="c57-0165__main__30"/> of my enemy my hopes were suddenly extinguished <lb n="c57-0165__main__31"/> and I <del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29791__Start"/>ly<del loc="c57-0165__main__d1e29791__End"/> – The wind arose the sea roared<lb n="c57-0166__main__1"/> and with the mighty shock of an earthquake <lb n="c57-0166__main__2"/> it sp<mdel>i</mdel>lit & cracked with a <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e29813__Start"/>crash<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e29813__End"/> tremendus <lb n="c57-0166__main__3"/> and overwhelming sound — The work was <lb n="c57-0166__main__4"/> soon finished in a few minutes a migh<lb n="c57-0166__main__5"/>ty ocean rolled between me & my enemy. <lb n="c57-0166__main__6"/> And I was left difting on a scattered piece <lb n="c57-0166__main__7"/> that was every moment lessening <lb n="c57-0166__main__8"/> and thus preparing for me a hideous <lb n="c57-0166__main__9"/> death – <del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e29848__Start"/>hideous<del loc="c57-0166__main__d1e29848__End"/> hours <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>passed<lb n="c57-0166__main__10"/> several of my dogs died
